headline.main: Napoli Coach, Club President Break Ice With Cinema Talk
headline.print_headline: Napoli Coach, Club President Break Ice With Cinema Talk

lead_paragraph: Napoli coach Maurizio Sarri has broken a frosty three-week silence with club president Aurelio Di Laurentiis, but said the pair discussed cinema rather than Tuesday's Champions League clash with Real Madrid.
snippet: Napoli coach Maurizio Sarri has broken a frosty three-week silence with club president Aurelio Di Laurentiis, but said the pair discussed cinema rather than Tuesday's Champions League clash with Real Madrid....
